simpleLoading.title:
Please wait.
We are processing your payment.
simpleLoading.description:
Please wait until the payment has been completed successfully.
This usually only takes a few seconds.

3ds.title:
You will now be redirected
to your bank's website to confirm 3‑D Secure protection.
3ds.description:
There may be a delay between passing the 3‑D Secure check
and receiving the payment. It depends on the bank you used for payment.

systemSuccess.title:
Your payment provider
has provided a successful initial response.
systemSuccess.description:
The final decision will be made soon. Please be patient.
Payment systems sometimes experience delays for technical reasons.

noMoneyError.title: Declined
noMoneyError.subtitle: Insufficient funds.
noMoneyError.description:
Please go back
and try another method of payment.

unknownError.title: Too bad!
unknownError.subtitle: An error occurred.
unknownError.description:
This error occurs
once every 10,000 times!

success.title: Let's do it!

titleSubSlave.key: Activate the key on the license provider's website. Instructions
titleSubSlave.product: Youâ€™ve bought a new game. Congratulations! Have fun!
titleSubSlave.virtual_items: New items have been added to your account. Have fun!
titleSubSlave.virtual_currency: New funds have been added to your game account!

success.descriptionSlaveInitial: Enter your email address to get a receipt.

descriptionSlaveFinal.key: Payment confirmation and an activation key have been sent to
descriptionSlaveFinal.product: Payment confirmation and an access link have been sent to
descriptionSlaveFinal.simple: Payment confirmation has been sent to
descriptionSlaveFinal.virtual_items: Payment confirmation has been sent to
descriptionSlaveFinal.virtual_currency: Payment confirmation has been sent to

FormSectionBankCard.cvvInfo:
The three numbers
on the back of the card
FormSectionBankCard.rememberInfo: Payment information is stored in accordance with the requirements of the PCI and DSS standards using the 3‑D Secure and SSL protocols.

PaymentAreaWarning.cantAcceptPayments: We can't accept payments from your country.
PaymentAreaWarning.chooseAnotherArea: Did we detect your country incorrectly? Please choose the right one.

OrderCreationError.title: Unfortunately, we were unable to create the order for payment.
OrderCreationError.unknownError: This error occurs once every 10,000 times!
